solution_line_template: The money she earns from selling paintings is {paintings_sold} * ${price_per_painting} = $<<{paintings_sold}*{price_per_painting}={money_from_paintings}>>{money_from_paintings}
The total money she makes from her art is ${contest_prize} + ${money_from_paintings} = $<<{contest_prize}+{money_from_paintings}={total_money}>>{total_money}
